评论详情: I love these shades. They’re so cute. Lightweight but sturdy. Very good quality for a great price. Love the grey lenses; they’re dark when looking at them, but not too dark that you can’t see. But these will definitely block the Sun from your eyes. I also like the unique shape. They came with a nice, soft storage bag, as well. Great price. Definitely recommend.
These are such a fun color and a cute style.  I am loving the cat eye shape and the bag for storage is super soft.  They are lightweight and comfortable to wear too.  Recommend!
